item.title: Day 135, 2 Samuel 13-15
item.description: After the events with Bathsheba, David’s house falls into turmoil and strife. David’s son Amnon loved his sister Tamar. On the advice of Jonadab, David’s nephew, he lured Tamar into his room on the pretense of being sick and raped her.
